stimulusHtml: Write an expression, involving an integral, that represents Mighty's profit on the sale of a cable that is k meters long.

features.html: Mighty Cable Company manufactures cable that sells for $120 per meter. For a cable of fixed length, the cost of producing a portion of the cable varies with its distance from the beginning of the cable. Mighty reports that the cost to produce a portion of a cable that is x meters from the beginning of the cable is \(6\sqrt{x}\) dollars per meter. (Note: Profit is defined to be the difference between the amount of money received by the company for selling the cable and the company's cost of producing the cable.)
